SELECT
WALK_CODE,WALK_WRITER,TO_CHAR(WALK_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS WALK_DATE,WALK_TITLE,WALK_CONTENT,WALK_MID,WALK_MAP,WALK_REPLYCOUNT, NVL(WALK_RECOMMEND,0)AS WALK_RECOMMEND,NVL(WALK_DECOMMEND,0)AS WALK_DECOMMEND,WALK_REPORT,WALK_HITS,WALK_STARTADDR,WALK_WEATHERINFO,WALK_TIME,WALK_BODYTYPE, WALK_PEOPLE
FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RN, WALKBOARD.* FROM WALKBOARD WHERE WALK_STATE = 1 AND WALK_CODE LIKE 'WB%' AND WALK_STARTADDR LIKE '%'||#{searchAddr}||'%' AND WALK_TIME >= SYSDATE

AND WALK_TITLE LIKE '%'||#{searchWord }||'%'
AND WALK_TITLE LIKE '%'||#{searchWord }||'%' OR WALK_CONTENT LIKE '%'||#{searchWord}||'%'
ORDER BY WALK_CODE ASC) WHERE RN BETWEEN #{startRow} AND #{endRow}
